events.title: Black Lives Matter Rally
events.about: #BLM is a call to action to the virulent anti-Black racism that permeates our society. It is rooted in the experiences of Black people in this country who actively resist our de-humanization.

events.title: Who's Teaching Us
events.about: Whoâ€™s Teaching Us is a rally to raise awareness for the need of faculty diversity and support for marginalized studies and community centers on campus.

events.title: Fossil Free Stanford
events.about: Movement calling on Stanford University to freeze new fossil fuel investments and fully divest from fossil fuels within the next five years.

events.title: Take Back the Night
events.about: Rally, march, and speakout against sexual violence on campus

events.title: Out of the Darkness Walk
events.about: Out of the Darkness walks are approximately 5k walk events that fundraise and create awareness for suicide prevention and serve as a place for survivors of suicide loss and those suffering from mental illness to come together in support of continued suicide prevention and mental health education, programming, and legislation.
